meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an archegonium.
meanings.sent1: The archegonial structure was carefully studied by the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The archegonial features of the plant were fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The archegonial design of the building made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent4: Her archegonial attention to detail in her artwork was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The archegonial beauty of the flower captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the female reproductive organ in mosses, ferns, and most gymnosperms.
meanings.sent1: The archegonial structure played a crucial role in the plant's reproduction.
meanings.sent2: The archegonial organ was essential for the plant's reproductive process.
meanings.sent3: The archegonial function of the organ was vital for the plant's survival.
meanings.sent4: Her archegonial dedication to her work mirrored the plant's reproductive system.
meanings.sent5: The archegonial importance of the organ was evident in its role in reproduction.
